original_text: And there were those who said, “We have borrowed money for the king's tax on our fields and our vineyards.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 말하기를 우리는 밭과 포도원으로 돈을 빚내서 왕에게 세금을 바쳤도다

sentences.original_text: And there were those who said,
“We have borrowed money for the king's tax
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 왕의 세금 때문에 돈을 빌렸습니다

sentences.original_text: on our fields and our vineyards.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 우리 밭과 포도원에 대한 것입니다.
